data.description: A string specifying the BEDPE file path, a dataframein BEDPE format specifying data to be plotted, or a\link[InteractionSet]{GInteractions} object

chrom.description: A string specifying the chromosome of region to be plotted

chromstart.description: An integer start position on chromosome to be plotted

chromend.description: An integer end position on chromosome to be plotted

assembly.description: A string specifying the default genome assembly or a\link[plotgardener]{assembly} object

style.description: A character value describing the style of arches

flip.description: A logical value indicating whether to reflect arches overthe x-axis

curvature.description: A numeric indicating the number of points along thearch curvature

archHeight.description: A numeric value, numeric vector, or column namein data specifying the arch heights

fill.description: A character value, a vector, or a\link[plotgardener]{colorby} object specifying fill colors of arches

linecolor.description: A character value, a vector, or a\link[plotgardener]{colorby} object specifying the color of the linesoutlining arches

bg.description: A character value indicating background color

clip.description: A logical value indicating whether to clip anyarches that get cutoff in the given genomic region

clip.noAnchor.description: A logical value indicating whether to clipany arches that overlap the given genomic region but do nothave an anchor in that region

range.description: A numeric vector of length 2 specifying the y-rangeof \code{archHeight} to plot (c(min, max))

baseline.description: A logical value indicating whether to includea baseline along the x-axis

x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying pair arches plot x-location

y.description: A numeric, unit object, or character containing a "b"combined with a numeric value specifying BEDPE arches plot y-location

width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying pair arches plot width

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying pair arches plot height

just.description: A string specifying the justification of pair arches plot relative to its (x, y)location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to use if\code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, or \code{height} are only given asnumerics

draw.description: A logical value indicating whether graphics output should beproduced

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} object containingrelevant function parameters
